title: SARS-CoV-2, Influenza and Other Respiratory Viruses: Epidemiology, Burden of Disease, and Preventive Measures.
abstract: Four years after the acute COVID-19 emergency, respiratory viruses circulate in overlapping seasonal patterns that repeatedly test surveillance systems and healthcare capacity [...].
